Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.api.broom

Interface IBroomPartRegistry

All Superinterfaces:
org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
All Known Implementing Classes:
BroomPartRegistry
public interface IBroomPartRegistry extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.init.IRegistry
Registry for broom parts.
